book-tickets-des: Place to book movie tickets at NHCinema
note-des: Do not buy tickets for children under 13 years old for movie screenings that end after 10:00 p.m. and do not buy tickets for children under 16 years old for movie screenings that end after 11:00 p.m.
empty-left-seat: The empty seat on the left still cannot be purchased after choosing the seat.
empty-right-seat: The empty seat on the right still cannot be purchased after choosing the seat.
empty-left-seat-cancel: Will create an empty seat on the left side. You should cancel the seats one by one in order.
empty-right-seat-cancel: Will create an empty seat on the right side. You should cancel the seats one by one in order.
empty-between-seat-cancel: Will create an empty seat between two seats. You should cancel the seats one by one in order.
max-seat-warn: If you wish to book more than 10 seats, please proceed with multiple transactions or contact us at the counter!
